title.narrative: Upscaling Rural Renewable Energy - Solar PV

description.narrative: The objective is to improve reliability and sustainability of electricity services in Mongolia. The project aims to achieve its objectives by, inter-alia, supporting the development of a 10 MW solar power plant in the Western Energy System (WES), demonstrating the application of solar PV resources in a remote area.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
